c.x: To comply with the decedents wishes as much as possible;
To comply with tribal custom and tradition;
To provide a simple, efficient and inexpensive method for probating deceden
To ensure the rights of creditors of decedents are protected to the extent
To promote and further the tribe's inherent right to self-governance.
